CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: N wants C to put doll in bed
C reaches to put doll in bed
M points to doll C has in hand
C manipulates car; makes car sounds
M demonstrates how to put cup on plate
C walks to N and hands cup
M demonstrates how to put cup on plate; C hands cup to N; N pretends to drink , N puts cup on table
